Position.CountByIdRecord: SELECT count(*) as countRecord from {0} WHERE {1} = @PositionID;
Position.DeleteMany: DELETE FROM Position WHERE PositionID IN @recordIDs
Position.FindById: select *, o.OccupationName from Position p left join Occupation o on p.OccupationID = o.OccupationID WHERE PositionID = @PositionID;
